entry.title: Notenik 5.9.0 Released
entry.content:
• Merge templates no longer write unmodified files;
  • Added new customization options for the Display tab;
  • Added allfields command to Merge templates.

entry.title: Leadership and Followership - 21 Key Observations

summary.p: I was reading recently about a couple of different situations involving traits of both leadership and followership. Some reflection on these two situations has compelled me to dispense the following bits of wisdom on the subjects of leading and following. Some of these may seem obvious, and some controversial, but they are all equally true and valuable, based on my own experience doing a fair bit of both in a number of different organizations.

entry.content: I was reading recently about a couple of different situations involving traits of both leadership and followership. Some reflection on these two situations has compelled me to dispense the following bits of wisdom on the subjects of leading and following. Some of these may seem obvious, and some controversial, but they are all equally true and valuable, based on my own experience doing a fair bit of both in a number of different organizations.

entry.title: Thinking Differently About Our Economy

summary.p: We all know that the economy is important. We talk about it every day. But do we ever think about… how we think about it? How we visualize it? How we've been conditioned to think about it, perhaps unknowingly?

entry.content: We all know that the economy is important. We talk about it every day. But do we ever think about… how we think about it? How we visualize it? How we've been conditioned to think about it, perhaps unknowingly?

entry.title: The Importance of Progressive Activism

summary.p: It was just a little over four years ago that I remember sitting in front of our TV with our neighbors, watching the election returns, preparing to celebrate.

entry.content: It was just a little over four years ago that I remember sitting in front of our TV with our neighbors, watching the election returns, preparing to celebrate.

entry.title: Notenik 5.8.0 and 5.8.1 Released
entry.content:
• Fixed a crash occurring when using Merge templates;
  • Fixed a bug resulting in a double descending sort;
  • Added page type as an additional column for notenik-index scripting input;
  • Tweaked the Linked Tags Variable Modifier to allow specification of CSS classes;
  • Added an Author Name variable modifier to specify last name only or last name first;
  • Added copyfile template command;
  • Added Image Name field label and type;
  • Added Minutes to Read field label and type;
  • Refactoring of file input/output routines.

entry.title: The Decline of the Republican Party - First Gradually and then Suddenly

summary.p: In line with the famous quote from Ernest Hemingway, the Republican Party seems to see their fortunes on the decline – gradually for now – but perhaps suddenly before much longer.

entry.content: In line with the famous quote from Ernest Hemingway, the Republican Party seems to see their fortunes on the decline – gradually for now – but perhaps suddenly before much longer.

entry.title: Notenik 5.7.0 Released
entry.content:
• Fixed a bug that prevented Note duplication
  • Retain last Note Selection between launches
  • Added Drag and Drop for File attachments

entry.title: Free Speech at the Crossroads

summary.p: No matter where you stand on the political spectrum, questions surrounding free speech are hot-button items these days. Should anyone be free to say anything, about anyone, at any time, and to any audience? If not, who's responsible for moderation, and what are the rules? And at what point does moderation become censorship?

entry.content: No matter where you stand on the political spectrum, questions surrounding free speech are hot-button items these days. Should anyone be free to say anything, about anyone, at any time, and to any audience? If not, who's responsible for moderation, and what are the rules? And at what point does moderation become censorship?

entry.title: Notenik 5.6.0 Released
entry.content:
• Added a Sort Option for Date Added
  • Simplified Means of Creating a New Collection
  • Changing of File Extensions Enabled

entry.title: Notenik 5.5.0 Released
entry.content:
• Enabled Open Link in New Window for all hyperlinks on the Display Tab
  • Added Support for Extensive Field Renaming
  • Added Contextual Menu to List View
